Mouse.y tunes speed  ( better, since auto-demo suffers interf√©rences between the 2 times )

renderpass.code:
#define S(v)        smoothstep(4./R.y, 0., v)                  //
#define F(U,a,n)  ( mod( a + atan(U.y,U.x), 6.28/n ) -3.14/n ) // angular n-folding

void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 u)
{
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,
          U = 1.2*( 2.*u - R ) / R.y;
    
    float s = 20.*( length(iMouse.xy)<10. ? .5+.5*sin(iTime) : iMouse.y/R.y ),// speed
          a = F(U, -s*iTime, 3.),                              // angle dist to wing axe (3-folds sym)
          L = length(U), l = 2.*L-1., da = s/60.*6.28,         // angle covered per frame
          e = atan(.3*sqrt(1.-l*l)/L),                         // angle range of ellipse wing at height L
          h = max( 0., min(a+da/2.,e) - max(-e,a-da/2.) );     // wing motion blur coverage of pixel angle a

    U = L * cos( F(U,,6.) + vec2(0,11) );                      // grid: 6-folds sym
    O = vec4( mix( l<1. ? h / max(fwidth(h),da): 0.,           // motion blured wings
                   .5,                                         // grid color
                   L < 1.11 ?   S( abs( fract(L*15.)-.5)/15. ) // grid mask
                               + S( abs(U.y) ) : 0.
            )    );
}
